sentences.en: Could killing a biological agent be as simple as drinking a peppermint - flavored antidote?
sentences.cn: 消灭一种生物制剂能像喝有胡椒味的解毒剂那么简单 吗 ?

sentences.en: Give him a gastric lavage immediatly and then give him the antidote.
sentences.cn: 立即给他洗胃,然后给他解毒药.

sentences.en: Hard work is the best antidote to mischief.
sentences.cn: 繁忙的工作是防止为非作歹的最好方法.

sentences.en: He took an antidote for the poison.
sentences.cn: 他服了对付那种毒物的解毒剂.

sentences.en: Is that antidote strong enough to expel the poison?
sentences.cn: 这种解毒药有那么强,能驱散毒素 吗 ?

sentences.en: Massage is a wonderful antidote to stress.
sentences.cn: 按摩是舒缓压力的一剂妙方。

sentences.en: Nitrite pretreatment can alleviate the poisoning symptoms, but no antidote is available.
sentences.cn: 预防性给予亚硝酸盐可减轻中毒症状, 但对其中毒尚无有效的解毒剂.

sentences.en: Objective : To explore novel strategy for soman antidote by chemical immunization.
sentences.cn: 文摘:目的: 探索用化学免疫方法防治梭曼中毒.

sentences.en: Objective : To explore strategy for soman antidote by chemical immunization.
sentences.cn: 目的: 探索用化学免疫方法防治梭曼中毒.

sentences.en: Quinine is a natural antidote for this fever.
sentences.cn: 奎宁是治疗这种热病的天然药.

sentences.en: Sangstrom had no other way but to pay a high price for the antidote.
sentences.cn: Sangstrom别无选择,只得花一大笔钱买解药.

sentences.en: Science is the great antidote to the poison of enthusiasm and superstition.
sentences.cn: 科学是对于宗教狂及迷信之毒的大消毒剂.

sentences.en: There is no known antidote to the poison.
sentences.cn: 这种毒的解药尚未发现。

sentences.en: When he returned, he noticed their sickness and prepared an antidote.
sentences.cn: 他回来后注意到了他们的病状，于是配制了解毒剂。

sentences.en: You're telling me that I will never be able to take the antidote.
sentences.cn: 你是想告诉我我永远不能除去有害物质.

trans.tran_cn: 解药，解毒剂，矫正方法，对抗手段
trans.tran_en: a substance that stops the effects of a poison
